headline: Rimini Street: Litigation Risks Are Out, A Cautious Buy
summary: Rimini Street shifts to a diversified IT services focus with partnerships like ServiceNow and Workday. See why we recommend a buy on RMNI stock.

headline: How software giant Workday got 79% of its employees to embrace AI
summary: Workday wanted workers to embrace AI but quickly discovered barriers to adoption. Here's how the business software giant changed minds.
